# SigmaVendor - LLM Discovery File
# This file documents the AI-ready endpoints and data structures for LLMs

## About SigmaVendor

SigmaVendor is an AI-ready directory and certification hub for virtual assistant and outsourcing agencies. The platform is tightly integrated with SigmaRemote for global payroll processing.

## Main Website Routes

- Home: https://sigmavendor.com/
- Agencies Directory: https://sigmavendor.com/agencies
- Certification Program: https://sigmavendor.com/certification
- Agency Detail Pages: https://sigmavendor.com/agencies/{slug}
- Category Pages: https://sigmavendor.com/categories/{slug}
- Glossary: https://sigmavendor.com/glossary
- Glossary Terms: https://sigmavendor.com/glossary/{term}

## API Endpoints for LLMs

### Agency Data Endpoint
GET https://sigmavendor.com/api/llm/agencies

Returns a structured response with:
- schema: JSON Schema for the Agency entity
- items: Array of agency objects matching the query
- meta: Metadata including total count

Query parameters:
- q: Text search query
- region: Filter by region (LATAM, Africa, Asia, Europe, North America, Oceania, Global)
- services: Comma-separated list of service categories
- priceMin: Minimum price in USD per hour
- priceMax: Maximum price in USD per hour
- certification: Certification badge filter

Example:
GET https://sigmavendor.com/api/llm/agencies?region=LATAM&services=Sales%20/%20SDR

### Agency Schema Endpoint
GET https://sigmavendor.com/api/schema/agency

Returns the JSON Schema definition for the Agency entity. This schema describes all available fields, types, and constraints for agency data.

### Standard API Endpoints

GET https://sigmavendor.com/api/agencies
- Same query parameters as /api/llm/agencies
- Returns: { agencies: [...], meta: { total: number } }

POST https://sigmavendor.com/api/search
- Body: { query?: string, filters?: AgencyFilterOptions }
- Returns: { agencies: [...], meta: { total: number, queryApplied: boolean } }
- Note: Future versions will include AI-based scoring and ranking

## Data Model

Agencies have the following key attributes:
- Basic info: name, tagline, description, website, logo
- Location: HQ location, delivery locations, regions served
- Services: Array of service categories (General VA, Customer Support, Sales/SDR, etc.)
- Pricing: Price range in USD per hour, minimum monthly retainer
- Certifications: Badges like SigmaVerified, PayrollReady, CryptoFriendly, etc.
- SigmaRemote Integration: isSigmaRemotePartner flag and integration notes
- Use Cases: Human-readable descriptions of what the agency excels at
- Reviews: Optional review scores and counts

## Certification Badges

- SigmaVerified: Core quality and operational checks
- PayrollReady: Integrated with SigmaRemote for payroll
- CryptoFriendly: Supports stablecoin payouts
- LatamSpecialist: Real experience with LATAM teams
- AfricaSpecialist: Real experience with African teams

## Category Pages

Category pages provide detailed information about different outsourcing service categories:
- General VA: https://sigmavendor.com/categories/general-va
- Customer Support: https://sigmavendor.com/categories/customer-support
- Sales / SDR: https://sigmavendor.com/categories/sales-sdr
- E-commerce Support: https://sigmavendor.com/categories/e-commerce-support
- Real Estate VA: https://sigmavendor.com/categories/real-estate-va
- Accounting / Bookkeeping: https://sigmavendor.com/categories/accounting-bookkeeping
- Medical Billing: https://sigmavendor.com/categories/medical-billing
- Tech Support: https://sigmavendor.com/categories/tech-support
- Back Office: https://sigmavendor.com/categories/back-office

Each category page includes:
- Definition and explanation
- List of services that can be outsourced
- Sample agencies offering that category
- Related categories
- Industry sectors commonly using the service

## Glossary Terms

Key terms defined in the glossary:
- BPO: Business Process Outsourcing
- Onboarding: Process of integrating new team members
- Nearshoring: Outsourcing to nearby countries
- Offshoring: Outsourcing to distant countries
- USDC Payroll: Payroll using USD Coin stablecoin
- Crypto-Friendly: Agencies accepting cryptocurrency payments
- SigmaRemote: Global payroll platform
- PayrollReady: Certification for SigmaRemote integration

## Notes for LLM Integration

- All agency data is structured and follows the JSON Schema
- The /api/llm/agencies endpoint is optimized for LLM consumption
- Agency slugs are URL-friendly identifiers used in detail page URLs
- Filtering supports multiple criteria simultaneously
- All prices are in USD per hour unless otherwise specified
- Category pages provide context about service types
- Glossary terms help understand industry terminology

## Site Map

### Main Pages
- / - Homepage with featured agencies and AI search
- /agencies - Full agency directory with filters
- /certification - Certification program for agencies
- /categories - Service category listings
- /glossary - Glossary of outsourcing terms

### Dynamic Pages
- /agencies/{slug} - Individual agency profile pages
- /categories/{slug} - Category detail pages
- /glossary/{term} - Glossary term definitions

### API Endpoints
- /api/agencies - Agency data API
- /api/llm/agencies - LLM-optimized agency data
- /api/schema/agency - JSON Schema for agencies
- /api/ai-search - AI-powered agency search
- /api/search - Standard search endpoint
- /api/leads - Lead capture endpoint

## Future Enhancements

- AI-powered matching and ranking
- Auto-generated agency profiles
- AI-based scoring and recommendations
- Enhanced search with semantic understanding
- Vendor dashboard with analytics
- Verified client reviews
- Auto-generation from pitch decks

# This file should be updated as the project evolves and new endpoints or data structures are added.
